name: Galaxy Racer (NathanWhitehead)
description:
This is my 8th game in my game a week series!

In this game you get to choose your ship and it's glow color and race across 8 unique tracks. Grand Prix mode lets you take on each track in order, getting 60 points by the end will crown you champion!

Points are awarded 10 for first place and 1 less for each other place, example 2nd place gets 9 points.

This game works for both Computer and Mobile devices. (Note: it may say WebGL Build not supported for mobile devices, just ignore that lol)

Controls for mobile -> touch the side you want to turn/steer your machine. There are arrows on screen to help, so touch those if your inputs aren't working.

Controls for Computer -> same as the mobile, touch near the arrows to turn, but you can also use the left and right arrow keys to turn!

I hope you enjoy this game! Did you know I make lots of content and post a new game every week? You can find videos of the game progression here: One Week Games - YouTube and you can follow the daily updates on my instagram here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
